      • setMethod

        public HttpRequester setMethod(String method)
        Sets HTTP method.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method as String type (ex. "POST", "GET" etc)
        It's not case sensitive, so you can use both "POST" and "post".
        Since:
        v1.0.0

      • addParameter

        public HttpRequester addParameter(String key,
                                  String value)
        Adds a parameter for POST method. If specified HTTP method is not "POST", this parameter would be ignored.
        Since:
        v1.0.0

      • clearParameters

      • request

        public HttpResponse request()
                     throws SocketTimeoutException,
                            IOException
        Send HTTP request to a web server.
        Returns:
        An HTML response from the web server. It will return null if 'cancel' method is called during request.
        Throws:
        SocketTimeoutException - Occurs when timeout.
        IOException
